code_value: Questions 1~2  You have missed the spring outing that your class attended. Ask one of your classmates who have attended it two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  You are meeting your friend at the Science Museum, but you don’t know how to get there. Ask the policeman for help.
Questions 1~2  You have missed the spring outing that your class attended. Ask one of your classmates who have attended it two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  You are meeting your friend at the Science Museum, but you don’t know how to get there. Ask the policeman for help.
